brewery.brewery_description: An independent, family-run brewery for over 125 years. True Belgian craftsmanship. That's Haacht Brewery.

beer.beer_name: Charles Quint Blonde Dorée / Keizer Karel Goud Blond
Charles Quint Blonde Dorée / Keizer Karel Goud Blond
Charles Quint Rouge Rubis / Keizer Karel Robijn Rood
Charles Quint Rouge Rubis / Keizer Karel Robijn Rood
Charles Quint Blonde Dorée / Keizer Karel Goud Blond
Charles Quint Blonde Dorée / Keizer Karel Goud Blond
beer.beer_description:
Charles V, born in Ghent (Belgium), was one of the most important Emperors our history has ever known. Charles V (Charles Quint in French) was also a devoted beer lover. In his honour this 'imperial' Golden Blond beer has been created: a top fermenting specialty beer, with a spicy and hoppy aroma, a smooth flavour and a dry bitter aftertaste.
Food pairing suggestion: all kinds of starter, dishes with chicken or fish, a mild goat cheese.

Tongerlo Brown is a genuine Belgian abbey beer.

NOX, the Latin word for the night, refers to the beer's warm, dark colour. This subtle double has refined notes of vanilla, along with the delicate bitterness of dark chocolate that is given pride of place. Lovers of brown beer will recognize the perfect flavouring at once. And if this is your first time tasting a brown beer, it's a revelation.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 495 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 100!

beer.beer_description:
Seize the day with a special fruit beer - SUPER 8 Cherry

It with a fresh and tasty aroma, it has the full sharp and sweet flavour of summer cherries combined with wheat beer.

Contains concentrate from cherry juice (3,7% equivalent to 25% juice). Does not contain preservatives.

Tongerlo Brown is a genuine Belgian abbey beer.

NOX, the Latin word for the night, refers to the beer's warm, dark colour. This subtle double has refined notes of vanilla, along with the delicate bitterness of dark chocolate that is given pride of place. Lovers of brown beer will recognize the perfect flavouring at once. And if this is your first time tasting a brown beer, it's a revelation.

items.badge_description:
You obviously are a big fan of Belgian Beer, and rightfully so! Three cheers to the great Belgian beers and their uniquely crafted flavors!

That's 25 different beers from Belgium. Try 5 more for Level 6.

beer.beer_description:
Appearance:
Clear, light-blond in colour with a fine head.
 
Bouquet:
Delicate hoppy aromas
 
Flavour:
Initially slightly sweet with a touch of bitterness. Then comes the dry and thirst- slaking aftertaste. A balanced taste.

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 40 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 9!

Flavour:
Initially slightly sweet with a touch of bitterness. Then comes the dry and thirst- slaking aftertaste. A balanced taste.

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 115 distinct venues!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 160 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 33!

In his honour this 'imperial' Golden Blond beer has been created: a top fermenting specialty beer, with a spicy and hoppy aroma, a smooth flavour and a dry bitter aftertaste.

beer.beer_name: Charles Quint Rouge Rubis / Keizer Karel Robijn Rood
beer.beer_description: Charles V, born in Ghent (Belgium), was one of the most important Emperors our history has ever known. Charles V (Charles Quint in French) was also a devoted beer lover. In his honour this 'imperial' Ruby Red beer has been created: a top fermenting specialty beer, with a smooth and fruity aroma, a full and smooth flavour and a sweet Hoppy aftertaste. Food pairing suggestion: strong cheese, (grilled) red meat, chocolate desserts

OMMEGANG. NOT THE FIRST, BUT THE BEST!
Re-fermented in the bottle.

A straw-coloured belgian triple with a dry and robust character, a complex bitter and a delicate citrus aroma. Brewed with Belgian hops.

To underline the close link between the Charles Quint beers of the Haacht Brewery and the Ommegang of Brussel, a special brewage has been created for this occasion.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 195 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 40!

beer.beer_description:
SUPER 8 Blanche is a naturally cloudy
white beer of 5,1 vol alc, with a creamy head and a fresh aftertaste. We’ve been particularly generous with our herbs: a sturdy handful of freshly ground coriander and orange zeste turns our Blanche into a curious interpretation of a familiar beer style.

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 130 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 27!

beer.beer_description:
Tongerlo Christmas is the Christmas beer from the eponymous abbey. Beneath the striking, creamy head lies an amber beer with a spicy, fruity taste supplemented by a complex aroma of noble hops.

An authentic abbey ale

The age-old tradition of the White Canons of Tongerlo lives on in this officially recognised Belgian abbey ale. Tongerlo Christmas is a special brew that is only available during wintertime.
Re-fermented in the bottle

Tongerlo Blond crowned the 'World's Best Beer 2014'.
Blond beer with a fruity and hoppy aroma and a balanced flavour with a slightly bitter aftertaste.

This authentic Belgian triple stands out thanks to the scale of fruity notes and the re-fermentation in the bottle, which accentuates the refined bitterness of the aromatic hops.
Re-fermentation in the bottle Re-fermentation in the bottle gives the beer a more intense taste and aroma as well as a longer shelf life.

beer.beer_name: Charles Quint Blonde Dorée / Keizer Karel Goud Blond

In his honour this 'imperial' Golden Blond beer has been created: a top fermenting specialty beer, with a spicy and hoppy aroma, a smooth flavour and a dry bitter aftertaste.

OMMEGANG. NOT THE FIRST, BUT THE BEST!

A straw-coloured belgian triple with a dry and robust character, a complex bitter and a delicate citrus aroma. Brewed with Belgian hops.

To underline the close link between the Charles Quint beers of the Haacht Brewery and the Ommegang of Brussel, a special brewage has been created for this occasion.

Tongerlo Brown is a genuine Belgian abbey beer.

NOX, the Latin word for the night, refers to the beer's warm, dark colour. This subtle double has refined notes of vanilla, along with the delicate bitterness of dark chocolate that is given pride of place. Lovers of brown beer will recognize the perfect flavouring at once. And if this is your first time tasting a brown beer, it's a revelation.
Blonde beer of high fermentation brewed with hops, barley malt and yeast. Brewed in Flanders.

beer.beer_name: Charles Quint Rouge Rubis / Keizer Karel Robijn Rood
beer.beer_description: Charles V, born in Ghent (Belgium), was one of the most important Emperors our history has ever known. Charles V (Charles Quint in French) was also a devoted beer lover. In his honour this 'imperial' Ruby Red beer has been created: a top fermenting specialty beer, with a smooth and fruity aroma, a full and smooth flavour and a sweet Hoppy aftertaste. Food pairing suggestion: strong cheese, (grilled) red meat, chocolate desserts
A blond full of character flavoured with hop, coriander, oak and vanilla.

SUPER 8 Blanche is a naturally cloudy
white beer of 5,1 vol alc, with a creamy head and a fresh aftertaste. We’ve been particularly generous with our herbs: a sturdy handful of freshly ground coriander and orange zeste turns our Blanche into a curious interpretation of a familiar beer style.

Seize the day with a special fruit beer - Mystic Cherry.

It smells fresh and tasty and has the full flavour of summer cherries combined with wheat beer. Mystic lets you enjoy the taste of cherries all year round.
Contains 25% cherry juice. Does not contain preservatives.

Appearance Clear red in colour with a pink head.
Flavour Powerful cherry taste. A tart fruit flavour at the onset gently flowing into a subtle and sweet aftertaste that does not cloy.

Tongerlo Christmas is the Christmas beer from the eponymous abbey. Beneath the striking, creamy head lies an amber beer with a spicy, fruity taste supplemented by a complex aroma of noble hops.

An authentic abbey ale

The age-old tradition of the White Canons of Tongerlo lives on in this officially recognised Belgian abbey ale. Tongerlo Christmas is a special brew that is only available during wintertime.
Re-fermented in the bottle

Appearance:
Clear, light-blond in colour with a fine head.

Bouquet:
Delicate hoppy aromas.

Flavour:
The initial taste of Export 8 is a just a little smoother than a classic pilsner. Its dry, extra thirst-quenching aftertaste and relatively low alcohol content make Export 8 a very drinkable beer.

The age-old tradition of the White Canons of Tongerlo lives on in this officially recognised Belgian abbey ale. Tongerlo Christmas is a special brew that is only available during wintertime.

Re-fermentation in the bottle gives the beer a more intense taste and aroma as well as a longer shelf life.

Amber coloured with a spicy aroma of hops. The slightly sweet, complex fruit taste ends in a light, pleasant aftertaste.
Formerly known as Abdij van 't Park Blond

Appearance
Dark, candy colour, with a light, creamy head.

Flavour
Mildly sweet at the onset followed by a very powerful aftertaste that is slightly sweet with a subtle hint of bitterness.
Formerly known as Abdij van 't Park Bruin
Brewed by Brouwerij Haacht Brasserie for Marks & Spencers stores UK.
Super 8 Rouge is a Belgian strong fruit beer with notes of cranberry. It is best served at 8 degrees Celsius. Super 8 Rouge is brewed by the Haacht Brewery.
